abstract: At least 38 people are killed and six injured in fire at retirement home in China's Henan Province.
lead_paragraph: With a rapidly aging population and an underfunded social security system, China faces increasing pressure to provide safe, affordable care for retirees.

headline.main: Fire Kills 38 at Seniors Home in China
headline.print_headline: Fire Kills 38 at Retiree Home in China

snippet: With a rapidly aging population and an underfunded social security system, China faces increasing pressure to provide safe, affordable care for retirees.
